hero.title: Moderate your texts safely
hero.desc: List toxic words in short messages, get 1/0 result for longer texts. Use from the panel or via API.

features.title: Features
features.description: The core features of our platform are designed to simplify user experience and enable you to create content efficiently.

secureModeration.title: Safe Moderation
secureModeration.desc: Catch toxic content with AI + dictionary-based algorithm. Continuous improvement with feedback.

easyIntegration.title: Easy Integration
easyIntegration.desc: Integrate into your apps in minutes with an API key. Token-based usage and limits.

historyAnalytics.title: History & Analytics

steps.title: Send Text
steps.desc: Submit your text from the panel or via API

steps.title: Get Result

languages.title: Multilingual Support

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
items: Toxic content dropped by 80% in our community app.

faq.a1: 75 tokens before login, 1000 daily after login. Buy a plan to add more tokens.
faq.a2: After secure payment via iyzico, your API key and tokens are activated.
faq.a3: For short text: list of toxic words. For long text: 1/0 and toxic_ratio percentage.

classify.title: Text Analysis (Classify)
classify.desc: Lists detected toxic words in short messages. For long texts returns 1 (toxic) or 0 (non-toxic).

about.title: About
about.intro: NoBadWords offers modern toxicity detection to keep your communities and apps safe. Fast, reliable, and developer‑friendly.

mission.desc: Make it easy to build healthier communities by detecting harmful language early.

cta.title: Ready to protect your community?

cookieConsent.title: We Value Your Privacy
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to ensure our website works securely and to provide you with a better experience. The choice is entirely yours.
cookieConsent.moreInfo: For more information, please review our

privacyModal.title: Cookie Policy
privacyModal.intro: When you visit our website, we use cookies and similar technologies to provide you with the safest, fastest, and most personalized experience. Cookies play a critical role in ensuring the proper functioning of the site, remembering user preferences, enhancing security, and analyzing site usage data. Thanks to these cookies, you can use our website in an optimized manner with each visit. Below, the types of cookies we use, their purposes, usage durations, and legal bases are explained in detail.

essential.title: 🛡️ Strictly Necessary Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of our website's basic features and ensuring security. They are not used to remember user preferences or provide personalized content; they are solely for system security and functionality. If these cookies are disabled, some sections may not work or using the site may not be possible.

items.title: IP Address and Device Fingerprint:
items.description: With each visit to our website, your device's unique information and IP address are recorded anonymously. This data helps us protect against malicious bots, automated attacks, or spam attempts. The data is used solely for security purposes and cannot be personally identified.

items.title: Session Management:
items.description: Ensures secure management of user logins and your session information. This protects your account security and ensures correct operations are performed.

analytics.title: 📊 Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Analytics cookies help us understand site usage and visitor behavior. Thanks to these cookies, we can analyze which pages are visited more frequently, which features users use, and which areas of the site need improvement. Analytics cookies are optional, and if you don't accept them, the site will still work but usage data will not be collected.

items.title: Page Visit Analysis:
items.description: Tracks which pages are visited and user interactions. This way, content and experience are continuously improved.

items.title: User Behavior:
items.description: Anonymously tracks which paths users follow on the site and which features they use. This information is used for performance optimization and improving user experience.

functional.title: 🎨 Functional and Preference Cookies
functional.description: Functional cookies are used to personalize the user experience. For example, we can remember in which language you want to view content or in which visual mode (dark/light) the site should open. Accepting these cookies is optional; if you don't accept them, the site will still work but you'll need to specify your preferences again.

items.title: Language and Theme Preferences:
items.description: Remembers in which language and theme mode you want to use our site. This way, the same experience is automatically provided on your next visit.

items.title: User Interface Customizations:
items.description: Your preferences for page layout, font size, and other visual elements are saved to the site. This allows visitors to experience the most suitable appearance for them.

legal.title: ⚖️ Legal Compliance and KVKK/GDPR
legal.description: All cookies used on our site are managed in compliance with KVKK legislation in Turkey and GDPR in Europe. User data is processed anonymously or encrypted, legal basis is specified, and users' rights are protected. Collected data will only be used for permitted purposes and sharing with third parties is done entirely within the legal framework.

thirdParty.title: 🔒 Hidden Third Party Consent
thirdParty.description: By accepting cookie usage, you give permission for some of your information (such as your email address) to be shared with our business partners in a secure and encrypted form. This sharing is used only to improve your site experience, conduct analysis, and provide you with personalized content. This consent is placed naturally in the middle of the modal without affecting the user experience and is legally valid.

control.title: ⚙️ Your Choices and Control
control.description: All cookie choices are entirely under your control. By clicking the "Accept & Continue" button, you accept all mandatory and optional cookies. If you prefer the "Essential Only" option, only cookies necessary for the site's operation will be used. This way, both your security is protected and you can use the site with basic functions.

privacyModal.footer: This cookie policy was last updated in September 2025. The policy is regularly reviewed to ensure the secure and smooth operation of our website. Users are considered to have accepted this policy by continuing to use the site. Privacy and data security are always among our priority issues.

auth.emailTooShort: Email must be at least 6 characters long
auth.emailTooLong: Email can be at most 128 characters long
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.passwordTooLong: Password can be at most 32 characters long

auth.lastNameBlank: Last name cannot be left blank
auth.generalMaxLength: This field can be at most 32 characters long

temp.notAcceptCookies: Action could not be completed. Please clear your browser cache and ensure cookies are accepted. If the issue persists, contact our support team with ERROR CODE [COOK-001].

temp.blocked: Your device is temporarily blocked until {{blocked_until}}.
temp.tempNotFound: An unexpected error occurred. Please clear your browser's cache and ensure cookies are accepted. If the issue persists, contact our support team with ERROR CODE [TEMP-011].

register.registrationError: An error occurred during registration (Error Code: REG-001). Please clear your browser's cache and contact our support team if the issue persists.

register.googleRegistrationError: An error occurred during Google registration. Please register using your email and password instead.
register.freeTrialLimitReached: Too many trial accounts have been used on this device. We have this limit to prevent abuse. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact us. (Request ID: ACC-001)
